description: A small walk to see a canyon viewpoint.
directions: Drive along Forest Avenue past the Kitimat Chamber of Commerce for 4.3 km. The entrance to the trail at the top of the ridge is on the left hand side marked by signs on the tree just before the beginning of the trail (if you come to a bridge, you have gone too far). It is approximately 20 minutes to the canyon viewpoint.
title: Hirch Creek (short)
